main.title: AI-Powered Customer Analytics Platform
main.description: A comprehensive machine learning platform that analyzes customer behavior patterns, segments users based on purchasing history, and generates predictive insights for business decision-making. The system processes large datasets in real-time and provides interactive dashboards for stakeholders.
features: Real-time customer behavior tracking and analysis
Advanced machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics
Automated customer segmentation based on purchasing patterns
RESTful API for integration with existing systems
Role-based access control and user management
Export capabilities for reports and data visualization
